message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.MM 

This paper deals with human pose forecasting, which is a problem in computer vision. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a generative framework using variational autoencoders, which falls under the sub-category cs.LG (Machine Learning). The use of Deep Markov Models (DMMs) also suggests the sub-category cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The applications of human-robot interaction and autonomous driving suggest the sub-category cs.RO (Robotics). Finally, the use of a video dataset suggests the sub-category cs.MM (Multimedia).
